title: ARAM mastery tokens
body:
I just earned a S on a champion that has been lvl 5 for a while. I did not receive a champion mastery token. This happened on an aram match.
The match can be seen here. http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2217360905/33541250?tab=overview

replies.body:
In many ways, ARAM can be harder, simply because of how random the champs received can be. I burned out in SR because of how long it took just to really have any action in game. I've been on ARAM for a long time and there should be some form to get the mastery tokens for those of us that aren't living on SR all the time.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

I feel the same way. SR is so repetitive and gets monotonous after a while and ARAM offers more action. I would like to add that in ARAM there is a higher difficulty in winning fights since almost all fights are 5 vs 5 and small skirmishes are rare.
im the same i did play SR but just got bored cause the game takes to long and aram is straight into action hence hy ive played aram for a long time now

Why can you not earn a mastery level token for ARAM? Any good reason in particular? Or just SR is the only map that is cared about?
{{champion:27}} {{item:3070}}

> Mastery level 6 and 7 have a higher competitive bar as far as performance requirements. Alternate game modes are intended to offer variety in play with a less competitive standard for players. We want to maintain mastery levels 6 and 7 as achievements specific to high performance in competition, so they will only be achievable in SR modes. - Riot Socrates

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/q/chromas-yorick-and-champ-mastery-ask-riot

Although this is a 3 year post.

I would just like to point out. 5 of my 10 mastery 7/6 champs are because of URF. So ya... f that logic.

> [{quoted}](name=Slaughtervomit,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=B9YdnOjn,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-06-19T10:19:32.367+0000)
>
> Why can you not earn a mastery level token for ARAM? Any good reason in particular? Or just SR is the only map that is cared about?
> {{champion:27}} {{item:3070}}

this is just a guess. but Aram is much different than normal matches, 1 lane. 
matches are usually shorter, people die more. and as a result you have more kills/assists. 

they would basically need a completely different algorithm for ARAM than normal matches. or else the data would be scewed like crazy

I only play aram, it's more fun imo. It can be very competitive. Ive had hundreds of intense matches, some lasting over an hour. That being said, I get to VS people in aram that have lvl 6 mastery frequently. So why cant I earn a token for playing aram? Wouldn't that make things even for when my team versus people that are lvl 6? Also I've achieved mastery lvl 5 on several champs in aram mode only. Then it stops at 5.. Why let me gain levels at all on aram?
You can only earn mastery tokens on SR normal and ranked games. You cannot earn them on ARAM.
What about chests?
Chests and keys can be earned on ARAM.

why would anyone play aram if there isn't anything to gain from it...kind of a waste of time...in summoners rift most of the games get ff'd before u even have a chance to get an s cuz people get so tired of losing....most every day ill get to 6 to 10 wins and ff everytime and I cant get an s with 10 wins with most characters I play with

Because some people like me don't enjoy playing SR at all, it's simply too slow and boring for me plus it's full of tryhards and flamers. On the other hand ARAM is fast and good mode to play if you play LoL just for fun. But it would still be nice to get mastery token when you get an S-.

we want mastery lvls in ARAM RIOT!

hear us and we will love you back

From patch notes of 6.12 
"NO 6 GODS Matchmade games on Howling Abyss, Twisted Treeline or any rotating game mode will not award Champ Mastery level 6 or 7 tokens"

> [{quoted}](name=theexileofu,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=B9YdnOjn,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-06-17T02:53:38.927+0000)
>
> From patch notes of 6.12 
> "NO 6 GODS Matchmade games on Howling Abyss, Twisted Treeline or any rotating game mode will not award Champ Mastery level 6 or 7 tokens"

but i got Jax to level 6 by playing nothing but URF mode as him. Aint that a rotating game mode?
URF is on SR
There was a time where you could earn mastery tokens on rotating game modes like URF, but Riot has long since removed the ability to do so.
I just got a Mastery 6 token with Vi on hexakill.
I do not think it is a 100% chance, is it? I have gotten multiple S / S- on SR and aram and not gotten any.
You need to be level 5 on the champion
I would actually say that it was better if there was the oppertunity to get tokens in Twisted Treeline .It's not that hard I know but i like the mode anyways.{{sticker:vlad-salute}}
I had the same problem with a game won with ashe last week. Opened a ticket and got a reply that they will respond to my ticket. And now I just got an S on Morgana. And no mastery 7 token :( sooo sad
Normals, and ranked, are the only place that tokens can be earned

The exact same thing happened to me; I don't know whether it's an update in the new patch or something. Would appreciate some info on this
2 things how did u get here and how dont you know how mastery tokens work yet

The same happened to me.
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2241912180/50171152?tab=overview
If you read any of the replies, you would know that this is not a bug. You cannot earn mastery tokens on ARAM.
